reviews.reviewBody: Classic, almost as if I was in France, except I think it'smore dense. But it's a always great pleasure and emotion to eat it.

reviews.reviewBody: Very, very good, no doubt. Very unique shape also (go have a look here: https://www.ritzparislecomptoir.com/fr/viennoiserie/pain-au-chocolat). I've bought it a few times, but I wouldn't eat it everyday neither. Because at some point, price matters. And this one is quite expensive.
